info.title: (DO NOT DELETE) Cardano Rewards API v2

200.description: A rewards result set with metadata.

accounts.description: The account that received the reward.

chain_id.description: Id of the chain rewards were recorded on. Always mainnet

validator.description: The address of the validator which distributed the rewards

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the end of the epoch

items.description: The formula to compute the final rewards in the currency unit is numeric x 10^(-exp). It also includes a type field which can be either member or leader.

text.description: The textual version of the other fields in the rewards object.

items.description: The account's staked balance to the pool for the epoch.

text.description: The textual version of the other fields in the balances object.

stake_key_hash.description: The stake key hash portion of the stake address. This is the bech32 decoded stake address with the first byte stripped and then hex encoded. Itâ€™s a common alternative way to search for a stake address.

network.description: The name of the network queried.

start.description: Epoch numbers (as integers) or timestamps (as strings "YYYY-MM-DD")

end.description: Epoch numbers (as integers) or timestamps (as strings "YYYY-MM-DD")
